title: NonNested
body:
This is a test line
-> Option 1
	This is the first option
-> Option 2
	This is the second option
This is after both options

title: Nested
body:
text
-> shortcut1
	Text1
	-> nestedshortcut1
		NestedText1
	-> nestedshortcut2
		NestedText2
-> shortcut2
	Text2
more text

title: Conditional
body:
This is a test line
-> Option 1
	This is the first option
-> Option 2 <<if 1 == 0>>
	This is the second option
-> Option 3
	This is the third option
This is after both options
